title: Client is super laggy!
body:
First of all, trying to log in takes about 5 minutes, and when finally logged in, whenever you try to access something like the shop or try to find games it says "[retrieving data from server](http://i.stack.imgur.com/lmSG9.png)" and if it fails to find a game or load the shop [this](http://i.stack.imgur.com/0M6Eu.png) pops up. Is there a way to get around this?

EDIT: Staying in log in screen for about 20 min straight, lol.

EDIT 2: Finally fixed! Logging in may take a while but the client function fine.

replies.body: Fix your servers RIOT dont lie the players they are working!! I got penalty cause of yout lagy client
I saw a few other reports of Login issues on EUNE last night. Are you still experiencing a slow login, or has the issue been resolved?
No, it fine now. Thank you anyways.
Report rito unskilled bug fixer xD
Fix 1 bug on Yasuo, 3 more appear.
well... i can't logg in... just stuck in logginloop, funny!

Same thing happening to me. I wasn't experiencing any problems at first, just noticing that the friend I was chatting with didn't appear online in the friend list. I re-logged in, a process which took many, many attempts. I kept getting stuck at "logging on forever" (and was put in a queue once). 
I got in, I tried joining a ARAM match. While in queue, I kept receiving "active game not found". It found people to match me up with, pressed accept everytime, yet many appeared to have declined. It put me back in queue automatically, then at one point, it just randomly told me that if I decline too many queues, I will receive a penalty.

I'm currently in a 15 minutes queue for ARAM, just as a fun fact.

This is exactly what happened to me as well! I got out of a game and suddenly started lagging, then restarted the client, took about 5-7 min tried to get into a game and got a message that I will get penalized if I keep dodging. They need to fix this ASAP.
